strings.string: C-Code generated on the watch by the corresponding main Datarun premium datafield
Version 3.06b of Datarun ultimate, copy 2 version (dummy setting)
Calibration factor for Tempe temperature in tenths of degrees (3 means 0.3 added, -4 means 0.4 subtracted)
___Time items___
___Distance items___
___Pace items___
___ETA items___
___Speed items___
___Heartrate items___
___Cadence and other running dynamics items___
___Power items___
___Workout items___
___Performance indicator items___
___Altitude and temperature items___
___Miscellaneous items___
'Timer', timer
'ElapsT', elapsed time (actual time minus start of timer moment)
'Lap T', current lap time
'L-1LapT', last lap time
'AvgLapT', average lap time
'Distance', total distance
'Lap D', current lap distance
'L-1LapD', last lap distance
'AvgLapD', average lap distance
Upper left field
Upper right field
Upper middle left field
Upper middle middle field
Upper middle right field
Lower middle left field
Lower middle middle field
Lower middle right field
Bottom left field
Bottom right field
Don't show middle field of upper middle right field and enlarge the other 2 fields
Don't show middle field of lower middle right field and enlarge the other 2 fields
Metric in upper clock/lap field
Calculation of ETA based on elapsed time of last lap, instead of total average speed
'Pace', current pace
'AvgPace', overall average pace
'L Pace', current lap pace
'LL Pace', last lap pace
'Altitude', current altitude
'T effect', aerobic training effect
'ETA', estimated time of arrival
Estimated finished time based on average or last lap pace
'Deviation', deviation from required finish in hours, minutes and seconds
'Req pace', required pace to meet required finish time
'EL gain',total elevation gain (total ascent in meters/hour or feet/hour depending on watch settings)
'EL loss', total elevation loss (total descent in meters/hour or feet/hour depending on watch settings)
Show current pace as Rounded Pace
Use 5 colors for coloring of pace field in middle row, instead of 3 colors
Use average pace for coloring of the pace field in middle row, instead of pace based on desired finish time
Show demo view for ID's and check license
Use black background instead of white
Force backlight on, regardless of device settings
Alternative for default military clock in upper field
Keep clock with military time
Show number of laps
Show clock with AM or PM instead of military time
Show metric
Enter license key
Not valid, only numbers allowed!
C-Code generated on the watch by the corresponding main Datarun premium datafield
Enter race distance in meters or thousands of a mile (imperial/statute watch settings) for estimated finish time
Not valid, only numbers allowed!
Enter desired finish time for estimated deviation of finish time (format like 03:59:00 required!)
'HR', current heartrate
'HR zone', heartrate zone
'Avg HR', average heartrate
'Lap HR', current lap heartrate
'LL HR', last lap heartrate
Functional treshold power, needed for Intensity factor and Training stress score
Critical power, needed for Running Stress Score
'IF', intensity factor
'TSS', training stress score
'RSS', running stress Score
Boundaries of a static powerzone for warning signal, a format required like (227:284)
Frequency for the warning signal for operating out of powerzone
Play sound as warning signal for operating out of powerzone
Power metric for alerts
Current running power
Power averaged over the last 3 seconds
Power averaged over the last 5 seconds
>Power averaged over the last 10 seconds
Power averaged over the last ... seconds (max is 300 seconds, this metric also needs to be chosen on display!)
Lap power
Average power
Font color for power alerts, when under powerzone
Font color for power alerts, when above powerzone
Green
Blue
Dark gray
White
Purple
Red
Black
Dark blue
'Pace 3s', pace averaged over the last 3 seconds
'Pace 5s', pace averaged over the last 5 seconds
'Pa ..s', pace averaged over the last .. seconds (max is 300 seconds)
'Vspeed-s', vertical speed averaged over the last 30 seconds (sum of ascent and descent in meters/seconds or feet/seconds depending on watch settings)
'Vspeed-m', vertical speed averaged over the last 30 seconds (sum of ascent and descent in meters/minutes or feet/minutes depending on watch settings)
'Vspeed-h', Vertical speed averaged over the last 30 seconds (sum of ascent and descent in meters/hour or feet/hours depending on watch settings)
'Av-asc-h', average ascent speed over the whole activity (in meters/hour or feet/hour depending on watch settings)
'Av-asc-m', average ascent speed over the whole activity (in meters/minute or feet/minute depending on watch settings)
'VAM-hour', vertical speed averaged over the last 30 seconds (ascent in meters/hour or feet/hour depending on watch settings)
'VAM-min', vertical speed averaged over the last 30 seconds (ascent in meters/minute or feet/minute depending on watch settings)
Pace or/and speed averaged over the last ... seconds (max is 300 seconds)
This needs to be a number from 2 too 300
's/100m', pace in seconds per 100 meter (for track running)
'Speed', speed in km/mile per hour
'Spd 3s', speed averaged over the last 3 seconds in km/mile per hour
'Spd 5s', speed averaged over the last 5 seconds in km/mile per hour
'Sp ..s', speed averaged over the last .. seconds in km/mile per hour (max is 300 seconds)
'L Spd', current lap speed in km/mile per hour
'LL Spd', last lap speed in km/mile per hour
'Avg Spd', average speed in km/mile per hour
'Cadence', current cadence in steps per minute
'RCadence', cadence in rotations per minute (for bike use)
'Avg Cad', average cadence
'Lap Cad', current lap cadence
'LL Cad', last lap cadence
'Avg EF', average efficiency factor
'Avg EI', average efficiency index
'Lap EF', current lap efficiency factor
'Lap EI', current lap efficiency index
'LL EF', last lap average efficiency factor
'LL EI', last lap efficiency index
'Temp', current watch temperature
'Tempe T', current Tempe temperature (requires Tempe!)
Use Garmin color scheme for label colors (not applicable for Palladino 10 powerzones)
'HR 3s', HR averaged over the last 3 seconds
'Power', current running power
'Pwr 3s', Power averaged over the last 3 seconds
'Pwr 5s', power averaged over the last 5 seconds
'Pwr 10s', power averaged over the last 10 seconds
'Pw ..s', power averaged over the last .. seconds
Power averaged over the last .. seconds (choose the number of seconds, max is 300 seconds)
This needs to be a number from 2 too 300
'N Power', normalized power
'A Power', average running power
'L Power', current lap running power
'LL Pwr', last lap running power
'Max Pwr', maximum produced power during activity
Power zones, a format required like 184:Z1:227:Z2:255:Z3:284:Z4:326:Z5:369
Use 10 power zones instead of 5
Power zones for 10 zone system, a format required like Power zones, a format required like 180:Z1:210:Z2:240:Z3:270:Z4:300:Z5:330:Z6:360:Z7:390:Z8:420:Z9:450:Z10:480
'Cur EF', current efficiency factor
'Cur EI', current efficiency index
'C P2HR', current power to heartrate ratio
'L P2HR', lap power to heartrate ratio
'LL P2HR', last lap power to heartrate ratio
'A P2HR', average power to heartrate ratio
'Cur Pzone', current powerzone
'3s Pzone', powerzone over the last 3 seconds
'5s Pzone', powerzone over the last 5 seconds
'10s Pzone', powerzone over the last 10 seconds
'Lap Pzone', powerzone for the current lap
'LL Pzone', powerzone for the last lap
'Av Pzone', powerzone based on overall average power
'%FTP', current power in percentage of FTP
'%FTP 3s', power averaged over 3 seconds in percentage of FTP
'L %FTP', lap power in percentage of FTP
'LL %FTP', last lap power in percentage of FTP
'A %FTP', average power in percentage of FTP
'%FTP 5s', power averaged over 5 seconds in percentage of FTP
'%FTP 10s', power averaged over 10 seconds in percentage of FTP
'%FTP ..sec', power averaged over .. seconds in percentage of FTP (depends on the value of power averaged over the last ... seconds [max is 300 seconds]
Disable colored label for upper left metric
Disable colored label for upper right metric
Disable colored label for upper middle left metric
Disable colored label for upper middle middle metric
Disable colored label for upper middle right metric
Disable colored label for lower middle left metric
Disable colored label for lower middle middle metric
Disable colored label for lower middle right metric
Disable colored label for bottom left metric
Disable colored label for bottom right metric
'DistNext', distance to next point
'DistDest', distance to destination
'%MaxHR', current HR in percentage of MaxHR
'L %MaxHR', lap HR in percentage of MaxHR
'LL %MaxHR', last lap HR in percentage of MaxHR
'A %MaxHR', Average HR in percentage of MaxHR
'kCal', used kilocalories
'LL s/100m', pace of last lap in seconds per 100 meter (for track running)
Weight in kilo's (needed for Running Effectiveness as used by Steve Palladino)
'RE cur', current Running Effectiveness (as used by Steve Palladino)
'RE 3sec', rolling average over the last 3 seconds of Running Effectiveness (as used by Steve Palladino)
'RE 5sec', rolling average over the last 5 seconds of Running Effectiveness (as used by Steve Palladino)
'RE lap', current lap Running Effectiveness (as used by Steve Palladino)
'RE Aver', average Running Effectiveness (as used by Steve Palladino)
Use large label font (default is off)
Use Fahrenheit instead of Celsius for temperature metrics (Celsius is default)
'P target, powertarget in Watt, useful when power correction is set only to influence powertarget
Powertarget in Watt as set in settings or defined by a workout, corrected by temperature/humidity/altitude if set in settings
Use correction factors for running power only to change powertarget
Power correction based on temperature
No correction
Correction based on Tempe temperature (no correction for temperature during first 5 minutes!)
Correction based on manual set temperature (manually set in settings)
Temperature in F or C by which Critical power or FTP is determined, for power correction based on temperature
Current temperature in F or C, for power correction based on temperature (manual setting instead of being delivered by Tempe)
'Pw cor%', calculated power correction percentage based on temperature
Power correction based on humidity
No correction
Correction based on manual set humidity
Current humidity in %, for power correction based on humidity
Humidity in % by which Critical power or FTP is determined, for power correction based on humidity
No correction
Correction based on altitude generated by barometer or GPS (watch decides independently which source it will be)
Correction based on manual set altitude
Current altitude, for power correction based on altitude
Altitude at which Critical power or FTP is determined, for power correction based on altitude
'GBalance', runningDynamics instantaneous ground contact balance (0 - 100%, requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
'GCTime', runningDynamics instantaneous ground contact time (in milliseconds, requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
'StanceT%', runningDynamics % ground contact time/stance time (0 - 100%, requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
'StepL', runningDynamics step length (requires running, in meters or feet depending on watch settings , requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
'VertOsc', runningDynamics instantaneous vertical oscillation (in mm, requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
'VertRat', runningDynamics vertical ratio (0 - 100%, requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
'L Wtarget', lower power boundary of a workout step (not for F5x), from Training peaks etc, corrected by temperature/humidity/altitude if set in settings
'U Wtarget', upper power boundary of a workout step (not for F5x), from Training peaks etc, corrected by temperature/humidity/altitude if set in settings
'L%target', lower power boundary of a workout step in % van FTP (not for F5x), from Training peaks etc, corrected by temperature/humidity/altitude if set in settings
'U%target', upper power boundary of a workout step in % van FTP (not for F5x), from Training peaks etc, corrected by temperature/humidity/altitude if set in settings
'Step nr', current step number of a workout (not for F5x)
'Remain T' or 'Remain D' or 'Button', remaining time or distance of the current step of a workout, shows "button" as label when it has to be ended by a button click (not for F5x)
Use a static powerzone for alerts, not powerzones from workout steps (not for F5x)
Show red clock over all metrics before the start of an activity (useful for a race when the normal clock isn't visible)
'Battery', current battery status (percentage)
Vertical ascent averaged over the time one is ascending (in meters/minute or feet/minute depending on watch settings)
Vertical ascent averaged over the time one is ascending (in meters/hour or feet/hour depending on watch settings)
Total number of steps today
Apply workaround for bug in cadance metrics being halved (currently for Fenix 6 and FR945 LTE)
Vertical grade in percentages over a certain distance (any distance is allowed, see elsewhere in the settings, but maximum time observed is 5 minutes)
Distance in kilometers for the calculation of vertical grade (any distance is allowed, but maximum time observed is 5 minutes)
Invalid value
